narrative:
This is a focused inspection to address the direct non-compliant items listed under 2.40 (b) (2) on the October 28,
2015 inspection report. The female Shih-Tzu identified by microchip (001-871-364) and the female Pug identified by
microchip (0A02456273) received veterinary care. 
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
 
Inspection and exit interview conducted with the licensee and Peggy Shaver, VMO.
Additional Inspectors
Shaver Margaret, Veterinary Medical Officer
